title: Toradora! - Episodes 01-25 [ENGLISH SUBS]
description:
Toradora!'s story begins with the male protagonist RyÃƒâ€¦Ã‚Â«ji Takasu who is frustrated at trying to look his best as he enters his second year of high school. Despite his gentle personality, his eyes make him look like an intimidating delinquent, so he is utterly hopeless about his chances of getting a girlfriend anytime soon, and does not have many close friends either. After being greeted by his hungover mother in the morning, RyÃƒâ€¦Ã‚Â«ji goes to school and is happy to find that he gets to be in the same class with his best friend YÃƒâ€¦Ã‚Â«saku Kitamura and a girl he has a crush on, Minori Kushieda. However, it is then that he unexpectedly knocks into "the school's most dangerous animal of the highest risk level"ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½Taiga AisakaÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½who just happens to also be in his class, and is a good friend of Minori.

Taiga has a negative attitude towards others and will not hesitate to snap at people. After meeting RyÃƒâ€¦Ã‚Â«ji, she takes an instant dislike of him. Taiga comes from a rich family, but she has moved out to live on her own due to family issues. She is coincidentally living in an apartment next to RyÃƒâ€¦Ã‚Â«ji's. When RyÃƒâ€¦Ã‚Â«ji discovers that Taiga has a crush on YÃƒâ€¦Ã‚Â«saku, and Taiga finds out about RyÃƒâ€¦Ã‚Â«ji's affections towards Minori, RyÃƒâ€¦Ã‚Â«ji suggests that they cooperate to win the objects of their affections. Taiga exploits the fact that RyÃƒâ€¦Ã‚Â«ji will do anything to get closer to Minori. She makes him her personal servant, getting him to do all her household chores (cooking and cleaning). Taiga spends a lot of her time over at his house, so much that she could almost be considered a member of his family. Since RyÃƒâ€¦Ã‚Â«ji spends a lot of time with Taiga, he has opened up to her world and to a side of her that most people do not see. The two also try to help each other improve the way people view them. However people they know from school start to become curious about their strange relationship and rumors begin to spread about them behind their backs.


These are fansubings, they are not from the company who made the show themselves.

Credits go to AniYoshi for providing the translations for Episodes 01-17; as well as CoalGuys for providing the translations for Episodes 18-25.
